data.title: Цены
data.text:
Aparthotel Des Alpes***

Кавалезе - Валь ди Фьемме 1.000 мт

All services of our Aparthotel Des Alpes

Aparthotel Des Alpes has a large hall, a restaurant and pizzeria (also to take-away), an indoor swimming pool and whirlpool, a stylish spa with two Finnish saunas and a Turkish bath, gym, playroom and baby room, garage and laundry.

In winter it also offers a ski-rental, as well as a free ski bus service to the cable cars.

Important to know: Covid19 emergency measures

Please notice that we reserve the right to organize the access to some of our services on the basis of governmental protocols for tourist accommodations, and coherently with health conditions at local and national level.

Included services

Fixed utility charge

Telephone, satellite TV, safe, microwave, hairdryer

Kitchen cleaning set (sponge and a little detergent)

Final cleaning (except for the kitchen area)

Bed linen and towels (one set per week per person)

Wi-Fi

Car park on the outside

Bikes storage

Big private park: relax area with deckchair, hammocks and showers; sport area with mini golf, football pitch, beach volley pitch and slack line; playground for kids

Barbecue area with charcoal, items, tables and benches

Fenced area for the dogs

Swimming pool open from Sunday until Friday from 15:00 until 20:00, on Saturdays open from 16:00 until 20:00 (mandatory swimming cup)

Gym (open from 9.00 am to 8.00 pm)

Spa (over 16, open from 3.00 pm to 8.00 pm)

Games room and baby room access (open from 9.00 am to 11.00 pm)

Soft animation in the evening during Christmas, New Year's Eve and Epiphany

Baby kit: high chair, bath tub, bottle warmer and changing table (to be requested during the booking act)

Crib/cot infant (max 2 years old), bed linen will not be provided (to be requested during the booking act)

Free Skibus

Extra services

Basic stroller rental (€2,00 per day), baby carrier rental (€5,00 per day)

Trekking stroller rental (€10,00 per day) - to be requested on spot

Bathrobe rental (€8.00 plus €25.00 as deposit).

Swimming caps (€3.00), armbands (€8.00) and goggles (€8.00) available to buy.

Laundry (€5.00 each wash included detergent, €5.00 each drying, iron and ironing board free of charge).

Garage: on request at time of booking €10.00 per day.

Additional child (under 24 months): €10.00 per day.

Animals €10,00 per day (max 2 for each apartment, not allowed in some apartments): to be requested during the booking act

Internal Restaurant: possibility of breakfast, half board or full board (for more info about the prices tel. +0462501997). - the restaurant must be paid directly on spot since it has external management

Kitchen set: oil (250 ml), vinegar (250 ml), sugar (500 g) and salt (500 g) for €12,00 (to be requested during the booking act)

Ski hire within the residence: for info on prices +3903487966612.

Midweek refresh: towels change + bathroom and floor cleaning at €50,00.

Midweek refresh service: towels change + bathroom and floor cleaning at €50.00 studios and apartments with one room, €70,00 apartments with two rooms.

Fiemme Guest Card: Winter Edition

Paying the compulsory tourist tax (free for children up to 14 years, € 2,50 per day for adults, to be paid for up to 10 days), the Fiemme Guest Card will be provided free of charge!

Галерея фотографий

Tel. +39 0461 930460 - Fax +39 0461 930781

info@trentinoresidences.it

To view the webcam, please accept third party cookies.
